name: aem-eds-backstop-workflow
description: This repository serves as an example of how BackstopJS can be integrated to easily add visual testing to a site. Using BackstopJS within EDS can significantly help ensure that no existing functionality is broken after changes are made.

scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:js -- --fix && npm run lint:css -- --fix

author: Ilya Kuliashou
